sentences.english: They prefer spending most of their off-hour on ACG than going out with friends.
sentences.chinese: 他們願意將自己絕大多數的業餘時間都花在ACG上。

sentences.english: Cartoon has a special kind of culture, we called ACG culture.
sentences.chinese: 動漫擁有着一種特殊的文化，我們叫作ACG文化。

sentences.english: Arriving at Atmos later this month is the Nike ACG Urban Night Pack.
sentences.chinese: 到達大氣本月末是耐克ACG都市夜組裝。

sentences.english: He is now a professor of international animation education of ACG.
sentences.chinese: 現在ACG的國際動畫教育教授動畫。
